pos_mean_info_list.mean: 采用；接受（adopt的过去式和过去分词）
养父母；[化工] 接受管

bilingual.source: It's important to adopt healthy eating habits.
bilingual.target: 采用健康的饮食习惯很重要。

bilingual.source: The company decided to adopt a new marketing strategy.
bilingual.target: 公司决定采用新的营销策略。

bilingual.source: Many language courses now adopt the communicative approach.
bilingual.target: 许多语言课程现在采用交际法。

bilingual.source: Many companies adopt TDD to improve software quality.
bilingual.target: 许多公司采用测试驱动开发来提高软件质量。

bilingual.source: The company decided to adopt msa to improve scalability.
bilingual.target: 公司决定采用微服务架构来提高可扩展性。

bilingual.source: We should adopt a more flexible approach to problem-solving.
bilingual.target: 我们应该采用更灵活的解决问题的方法。

bilingual.source: Many libraries adopt the bar codes technique to manage books.
bilingual.target: 许多图书馆采用条形码技术来管理书籍。

bilingual.source: Each actor had to adopt different personas for the play.
bilingual.target: 每个演员都必须为这部戏剧采用不同的人物角色。

bilingual.source: Many countries adopt protectionism to protect their industries.
bilingual.target: 许多国家采用保护主义来保护本国工业。

bilingual.source: We should adopt low-carbon lifestyles to protect the environment.
bilingual.target: 我们应该采用低碳生活方式来保护环境。

list.abstract: adopt（英[əˈdɒpt]，美[əˈdɑːpt]），英语单词，作动词为收养；采用；采纳。短语搭配有adopt resolution（通过决议）。例句为“Adopt an informal style of writing.（采用非正式的写作风格。）” adopt作及物动词时，其近义词有assume、take in sth。第三人称单数为adopts。现在分词为adopting。过去式为adopted。过去分词为adopted。

yingyinNormal.en: Anybody come to adopt us while we were out?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不在的时候 有人来领养我们吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Real quick. Do you think your mother would adopt me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，问你个问题，你觉得你妈会收养我吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Yours is from Vietnam, right? We were able to adopt one from Korea. So...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你女儿是从越南领养的，对吧？我们从韩国领养了一个，所以吧...

yingyinNormal.en: But you know how it is. People want to adopt a little golden-haired moron.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你懂的，人们都想收养金发傻妞。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry. It's just, you're you, you know? And I really want you to adopt me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，只是...你真是太了不起了，我超希望你能收养我。

yingyinNormal.en: Girls, I want you to meet Mr Gru. He's going to adopt you. And he's a dentist!
yingyinNormal.zh: 姑娘们 来见见格鲁先生。他是来收养你们的，他是牙医哦！

yingyinNormal.en: And of cause if you feel that neither of those is right for you, you could always adopt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你们认为上述两种选择都不适合，你们还是可以选择领养。

yingyinNormal.en: Bathroom is down the hall to your left. I would have told him to do it too. Can I adopt you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗手间在走廊那头，左边。我也让他这么做过。我能领养你吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Mowgli? They've given it a name. When was it we came to adopt man into the Jungle? He's just a cub.
yingyinNormal.zh: 毛克利？你们还给他起了个名字，什么时候我们也开始接纳人类进入森林了？他只是个孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: What if they're not? What if it's adopted by a king? Yeah. Because I hear the king is looking to adopt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要不是呢？要是被某国王领养了呢？是哈，听说国王要领养个孩子！

yingyinNormal.en: You know, my brother and his boyfriend have been trying to adopt for three years. What agency did you two go through?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我弟弟跟他的男友试了三年，都领养不到孩子，你们是找哪一家办的？

yingyinNormal.en: Or adopt "Flipism," a pseudo-philosophy of life in which the most important decisions are made by the flipping of a coin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或者使用"扔硬币原理"，这是一种伪哲学，意思是生活中最重要的事都要通过扔硬币来决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I've had ample opportunity to observe Browning and adopt his physical presence, study his mannerisms, and so on and so forth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经观察多日，习惯他的外貌特征 行为举止等。

yingyinNormal.en: It was the result of a unique approach to life I believe almost anybody can adopt. It starts with embracing reality and dealing with it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而是因为独特的处事方式，我相信任何人都能学会。我们要从拥抱和处理现实开始。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe this is part of a bigger plan. You know, maybe the reason we didn't adopt another baby after Lily was because god wanted us available for Sammy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许这一切是命中注定，也许在莉莉之后我们没有领养别的孩子，是因为上帝想让我们收养萨米。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 采取; 采纳; 通过

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 收养；采用；采纳；选择定居于；迁居；采取；把… 选为公职候选人；通过；正式批准；接受

sense_info_list.en: take up or start to use or follow (an idea, method, or course of action); formally approve or accept (a report or suggestion)
sense_info_list.zh: 采取; 采纳; 通过

examination_example.sentence: The Republican-penned order eliminated the strict net neutrality rules the FCC had <highlight>adopted</highlight> when it had a Democratic majority in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 共和党起草的这项命令取消了美国联邦通讯委员会在2015年民主党占多数时采用的严格的网络中立规定。

examination_example.sentence: The bills are similar to a measure recently <highlight>adopted</highlight> in Califomia, which last year became the first state to require gender quotas for private companies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些法案与加州最近通过的一项措施类似，该州去年成为第一个要求私企实行性别配额的州。

examination_example.sentence: That is exactly what happened when Norway <highlight>adopted</highlight> a nationwide corporate gender quota.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这正是挪威在全国范围内实行公司性别配额时所出现的情况。

sense_info_list.en: take on the legal responsibilities as parent of

word_usage.usage: 需注意区分adopt和adapt，adopt意为“接受，采取；收养”，adapt意为“适应；改编”

exam_freq_info.chinese: 采取; 采纳; 支持

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 收养；采用；采纳；选择定居于；迁居；采取；把… 选为公职候选人；通过；正式批准；接受

sense_info_list.en: take up or start to use or follow (an idea, method, or course of action); formally approve or accept (a report or suggestion)
sense_info_list.zh: 采取; 采纳; 支持

examination_example.sentence: But don't you want others to <highlight>adopt</highlight> your practices?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但你不希望别人采用你的做法吗？

examination_example.sentence: Those taxes could force poor people to <highlight>adopt</highlight> your life choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些税收可能会迫使穷人接受你的生活选择。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes people <highlight>adopt</highlight> certain beliefs in order to leave a favorable impression on those dear to them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时，人们采用某些信仰是为了给他们亲近的人留下一个良好的印象。

sense_info_list.en: take on the legal responsibilities as parent of

exam_freq_info.chinese: 采取; 采纳; 支持

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 收养；采用；采纳；选择定居于；迁居；采取；把… 选为公职候选人；通过；正式批准；接受

sense_info_list.en: take up or start to use or follow (an idea; method; or course of action); formally approve or accept (a report or suggestion)
sense_info_list.zh: 采取; 采纳; 支持

examination_example.sentence: But Dr. Richard Pile, argues that <highlight>adopting</highlight> this approach "could actually result in worse outcomes for individuals and society."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但理查德·派尔博士认为，采用这种方法“实际上可能对个人和社会造成更糟糕的结果。”

examination_example.sentence: Later, political strategists <highlight>adopted</highlight> the terms to influence public opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，政治战略家采用这些术语来影响舆论。

examination_example.sentence: What has changed, instead, is the relative share <highlight>adopting</highlight> different ways of living in early adulthood, with the decline of romantic coupling pushing living at home to the top of a much less uniform list of living arrangements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，发生改变的是年轻人不同居住安排的相对占比：浪漫关系的减少将“住在父母家”这种方式推到了一系列愈发多元化的居住安排的首位。

examination_example.sentence: Whereas older generations are sometimes reluctant to <highlight>adopt</highlight> new technologies, driverless cars promise real value to these age groups in particular.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然老一代人有时不愿意采用新技术，但无人驾驶汽车尤其有望为这些年龄组带来真正的价值。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 采取; 采纳; 支持

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 收养；采用；采纳；选择定居于；迁居；采取；把… 选为公职候选人；通过；正式批准；接受

sense_info_list.en: take up or start to use or follow (an idea, method, or course of action); formally approve or accept (a report or suggestion)
sense_info_list.zh: 采取; 采纳; 支持

examination_example.sentence_trans: 训练中采用了多种方法。

examination_example.sentence: Local organizations can <highlight>adopt</highlight> them for l pound, and install defibrillators to help in emergencies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当地组织可以以1英镑的价格采用它们（红色电话亭），并（在亭内）安装除颤器以在紧急情况下提供帮助。

word_family.mean: v. 收养；采用；采纳；选择定居于；迁居；采取；把… 选为公职候选人；通过；正式批准；接受

examination_example.sentence: His parents had him "<highlight>adopt</highlight> (领养) " a pangolin in Landon's name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父母让他以Landon的名义领养了一只穿山甲。

examination_example.sentence: Twins Jim Springer and Jim Lewis were <highlight>adopted</highlight> (领养) as babies and raised by different couples.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 双胞胎Jim Springer和Jim Lewis在婴儿时期被不同的夫妇领养长大。

examination_example.sentence: And whoever is lucky enough to <highlight>adopt</highlight> (收养) Sisu will get two best friends for the price of one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谁有幸收养了Sisu，谁就能以一只狗的价格得到两个最好的朋友。
